verses.name: Jeremiah 45:1
verses.text: The word that Jeremiah the prophet spake unto Baruch the son of Neriah, when he had written these words in a book at the mouth of Jeremiah, in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 45:2
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, the God of Israel, unto thee, O Baruch;

verses.name: Jeremiah 45:3
verses.text: Thou didst say, Woe is me now! for the Lord hath added grief to my sorrow; I fainted in my sighing, and I find no rest.
